duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete preventive maintenance requirements on machinery, engines, motors, pneumatic tools, conveyor systems, and production machines.
Troubleshoot malfunctions and locate sources of problems in mechanical, hydraulic, and pneumatic systems.
Remove and dismantle defective parts, and fabricate repair parts using machine shop instrumentation and equipment.
Maintain equipment, parts, and supplies inventories, anticipate equipment needs, and maintain technical knowledge.
Document and communicate actions, irregularities, and training needs within the work teams.
Comply with workplace procedures, rules, and regulations to maintain a safe and clean working environment.
Read blueprints, install and maintain various equipment, and use computerized maintenance system to retrieve and enter information.
Effectively communicate mechanical problems and solutions, participate in the training of line mechanics and apprentices, and observe safe work practices.

education_certification.credential: Journeyman’s papers or equivalent degree with 3 to 5 years’ experience OR 10 years of industrial maintenance.
